description: ai Input lr tiles extracted from the old aerial imagery 1998 500x500px. IntroThis notebook was used to make a super resolution version of old aerial images. This notebook is based on the one used in the fast. Instead of a GAN it make use of a Perceptual Feature loss function as described in this paper by Johnson et al https arxiv. ai course v3 lesson 7 about super resolutions https course. png files hr tiles extracted from a much newer aerial imagery 2017 500x500px.
